entry.title: Then He Kiss'd Me
entry.summary:
Author: Alwhisker

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,270Chapters: 1/10Kudos: 3

Summary: .... - "I didn’t need a glorified spandex ad to come to my aid" Wayne's tone was glowering and slightly breathless as he wiped the blood off his chin, looking over to the caped man who’d been covered in dust and rain, clark was taken aback, but remained his composure, it wasn't time to bicker with billionaires just yet. "you're welcome" he muttered, floating up to look over the crowd, he watched as the officers surrounded Bruce Wayne, EMT's checking over his wounds as the criminals were carted away into padded cars, flashing lights of cameras clicking around the scene. but clark could only focus on the man wiping his bleeding lip, effortlessly drawing him in, among the thousands of voices in his mind, only one stood out.only one."Alfred, I promise you I am fine, I- no, my leg’s fine, Grayson. Damian, stop."Clark found himself grinning, soft enough that he didn't notice it at first, but the clicks of cameras and flashing lights woke him up from his daydream, the wind under his chin was getting colder, Gotham's air was gentle on his skin, despite the smog in the air and the scent of blood that somehow always lingered, no matter how much they scrubbed down the streets.

entry.title: We Could Be Heroes - A SuperBat Love Story
entry.summary:
Author: xxEmilee_Lunaxx

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 71,785Chapters: 27/?Kudos: 116

Summary: Bruce Wayne and Clark Kent both maintain a strong sense of justice and fight for peace in their respective cities. However, both are struggling to maintain order alone, and are weighed down by a lost sense of identity and the loneliness that stems from the isolation of living a double life. After a chance encounter, the pair agree to form a Justice League to address the growing threat to Earth's security. As they learn to work together, new feelings blossom, and the heroes soon find themselves leaning on each other for support and comfort.Slow-burn romance. Bat-family drama. Justice League shenanigans. Bruce being a rich kid with issues. Superman being an innocent lad.Heavily inspired by Batman/Superman The Animated Series, Justice League, & Justice League Unlimited. Also takes inspiration from The Batman (2022), My Adventures With Superman (2023), and Batman: Caped Crusader (2024), and Smallville (2001).

entry.title: Space love
entry.summary:
Author: Speechless_since_1998

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,349Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 83

Summary: "It means that a dangerous criminal has taken refuge on your planet, and currently his plans are unknown."It wasn't Hal Jordan who spoke, nor one of the other Lanterns. Instead, it was a man a little younger than Batman who appeared behind the Green Lanterns, dressed in a blue and red suit, with a cloak on which there was a pin to stop him from the characteristic S-shape.The man's eyes were blue, not Bruce's icy color, but more like Dick's, warm, gentle, and when he smiled, he had a dimple on his left cheek. He moved confidently and calmly, like someone who is used to entering a room and being heard."With a look like his, it doesn't have to be difficult," he thought absently.-----Overworked, without a real love life, and with Dick in full teenage rebellion, the last thing Bruce needs is to have to babysit the powerful alien the Lanterns have brought to the Watchtower.But Kal El has his ways of breaking down all Bruce's barriers.

entry.title: Blasphemous Rumors
entry.summary:
Author: Fluffmonster69

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,796Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 4

Summary: Inspired by the events of Batman: Gotham By Gaslight (1989) Bruce Wayne is on trial, believed to be Jack the Ripper after the serial murders follow him from London to Gotham. Clark Kent is sent to report on the trial and the week leading to Bruce's execution. He is unnerved by Bruce, who's appearance and demeanor have drastically changed, however upon arriving back in Gotham a day after the trial Clark is greeted with the city in uproar. Bruce Wayne has escaped his imprisonment and criminals start cropping up half dead covered in identical puncture wounds. Clark sets out to find Bruce as Superman, finding instead a monster lurking in the shadows of Gotham's streets.*Tags and warnings may change.
